name: Carrot-Papaya Sangrita
description: Sangrita — the bracing blend of juice and spice that frequently accompanies tequila in Mexico — is commonly made with pomegranate juice. This vibrant variation, by Shannon Ponche of the Brooklyn bar Leyenda, calls for papaya and carrot juices instead.
recipeIngredient: 6 oz. papaya purée (preferably Perfect Purée brand)

recipeInstructions.text: Stir all ingredients together, and let sit for an hour. Strain into a pitcher, and keep cold. Serve with tequila or mezcal.
